mapper.sql: id, " house_uid", house_title, house_urban, house_street, house_district, house_lable, house_rent, house_state, house_area, house_floor, house_orientation, house_date, house_layout, house_staffid, house_audit, house_certificate
mapper.select: select code_number num,code_state val from code where code_type=7

select himg from house_img
and hid=#{houseId}

select a.*,DATEDIFF(NOW(),a.house_date) newstime, c.code_state as houlayout,d.code_state as houurban,f.code_state as houstreet,g.code_state as houorientation from house a join (select * from code where code_type=7) c on a.house_layout=c.code_number join (select * from code where code_type=11300) d on a.house_urban=d.code_number join code e on e.code_number=a.house_urban join code f on a.house_street=f.code_number join (select * from code where code_type=6) g on a.house_orientation=g.code_number join house_attention h on a.house_id=h.ah_hid
and a.house_id=#{houseId}
